body:
Comment 23 by **qeed.quan**: 
hi, I am not working on the project anymore with the people whose computers crash on
calling gl. I could try getting one of the person to test it, but I am not sure if he
will agree to help. Though for him to help, I think there should be a go 1.0.3 or so
that incorporate all these fixes because I don't want him to get annoyed at having to
compile the go source on windows. Thanks.

Hopefully ma.adam can help you more with the problem since he seems to have a computer
that can reproduce it.
